analytics.description: User satisfaction rating for dashboard relevance (Target: 90%)

analytics.description: Percentage of visualizations rendering under 2 seconds

analytics.name: Dashboard Customization Rate
analytics.description: Percentage of users who customized their dashboard layout

analytics.name: Time Saved per User
analytics.description: Percentage reduction in data interpretation time (Target: 35%)

analytics.name: API Response Time
analytics.description: Average API response time for dashboard data queries in milliseconds

analytics.name: Recommendation Engine Accuracy
analytics.description: Accuracy of adaptive dashboard widget recommendations

analytics.name: Data Refresh Rate
analytics.description: Dashboard data refresh interval in seconds
